title: Elihu Root Lectures of Carnegie Institution of Washington on the Influence of Science and Research on Current Thought
additional-note: Volumes in this series may have distinctive titles. Before concluding such volumes are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  Also search under Drama, since lectures for oral delivery may be registered under that class.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial, and there is as of yet no searchable database for pre-1951 dramas, as there is for books, but only page images of the relevant CCE volumes.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Eli Baum for copyright research on this title.
